xwikidoc.title: Developer Guide
xwikidoc.content:
{{warning}}This guide is a stub{{/warning}}
PhenoTips is built on top of [[XWiki>>http://xwiki.org]], a professional java-based with enterprise features such as strong rights management, LDAP authentication, PDF export, full skinning, advanced Form and scripting engine. For information about XWiki development, please consult the [[XWiki Developer Documentation>>http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/WebHome]].
(% style="width: 48%; float: left"%)((( ; {{icon name="sitemap" size="large"/}} [[General architecture>>Architecture]] : //Learn how PhenoTips is organized.//
; {{icon name="database" size="large" /}} [[Accessing the data>>DataAccess]] : //Learn how to access patient data, ontology data, etc from your own code.// )))(% style="width: 48%; float: right"%)((( ; {{icon name="puzzle-piece" size="large" /}} [[Custom user interface components>>DevGuide.UIX]] : //Add your own widgets in the PhenoTips UI.//
; {{icon name="cog" size="large" /}} [[Custom server-side components>>DevGuide.Components]] : //Write your own server-side components and services.//
; {{icon name="book" size="large" /}} [[API Reference>>DevGuide.API]] : //API Reference for the latest stable release.// )))(% class=clearfloats"%)((()))
